summary: The diff shows Gallery.tsx was updated to reference 14 new project images, but the image filenames used in the component have dimension suffixes (e.g., work-01.dim_1080x1350.jpg) rather than the simple work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg filenames specified in the requirements. Additionally, no actual image files were added to frontend/public/assets/generated/ â€” the diff shows 0 added files, meaning REQ-4 (saving the 14 static assets) is not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save all 14 newly uploaded project photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ using filenames work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows 0 added files. No image files were added to frontend/public/assets/generated/. The physical static assets are absent.

missing_requirements.requirement: All images must be loaded from /assets/generated/work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg as static paths (not with dimension suffixes).
missing_requirements.reason: Gallery.tsx uses filenames with dimension suffixes such as work-01.dim_1080x1350.jpg and work-02.dim_1280x960.jpg instead of the required plain filenames work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg.

hallucinated_features.description: Image filenames include dimension suffixes (e.g., work-01.dim_1080x1350.jpg, work-02.dim_1280x960.jpg) that were never requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies plain filenames work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg. The component uses dimension-annotated filenames not present in any requirement.
